links.title: Hall, D. K. and G. A. Riggs. 2021. MODIS/Aqua Snow Cover Daily L3 Global 500m SIN Grid, Version 61. [Indicate subset used]. Boulder, Colorado USA. NASA National Snow and Ice Data Center Distributed Active Archive Center.

title: MODIS/Aqua Snow Cover Daily L3 Global 500m SIN Grid
description: This global Level-3 (L3) data set provides a daily composite of snow cover and albedo derived from the 'MODIS/Aqua Snow Cover 5-Min L2 Swath 500m' data set (DOI:10.5067/MODIS/MYD10_L2.061). Each data granule is a 10°x10° tile projected to a 500 m sinusoidal grid.
